discovered.title: Davidson County Office of Veterans Services
discovered.description: County-operated veteran service office with certified VSOs providing assistance with VA disability claims, federal and state benefits applications, and community resource connections. Free services for veterans, surviving spouses, and eligible dependents in Davidson County.
discovered.address: 1125 12th Avenue South (inside Operation Stand Down TN)
discovered.eligibility: Veterans, surviving spouses, or eligible dependents who live, work, attend school, or are justice-involved in Davidson County
discovered.how_to_apply: Contact office to schedule appointment with a Veteran Service Officer
discovered.hours: Monday-Thursday 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Friday 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM
discovered.discovery_notes: County VSO office co-located with Operation Stand Down TN. Two certified Veteran Service Officers on staff. Free parking available. Serves 32,958 veterans in Davidson County.

discovered.title: Tennessee Department of Veterans Services - Nashville Office
discovered.description: State-level veteran services office providing assistance with federal benefits claims, state veteran benefits, and connections to resources. Veterans Resource Coordinators help file claims and connect veterans with federal, state, and local resources.
discovered.eligibility: All Tennessee veterans and their families
discovered.how_to_apply: Call or email to schedule appointment or inquire about services
discovered.discovery_notes: State headquarters office. One of 14 TDVS field offices across Tennessee. Provides both claims assistance and resource coordination.

discovered.title: Nashville VA Regional Office - Benefits Counseling
discovered.description: VA Regional Benefits Office providing in-person, virtual, and telephone appointments with benefits counselors for assistance with compensation, pension, loan guaranty, vocational rehabilitation, education, and insurance benefits.
discovered.how_to_apply: Use online scheduling tool VERA to arrange appointment, or call main number
discovered.discovery_notes: Official VA Regional Office. VERA online scheduling system available. Walk-in counselors available during business hours. VR&E specific contact: (615) 695-6372.

discovered.title: Operation Stand Down Tennessee - Veteran Services
discovered.description: Nonprofit veteran service organization providing comprehensive services including VA benefits assistance, crisis support, career services, and housing assistance. Hosts Davidson County VSO office on-site.
discovered.how_to_apply: Contact office or visit during business hours
discovered.hours: Monday-Thursday 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Friday 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM
discovered.discovery_notes: Major VSO in Tennessee. Houses Davidson County VSO office. Provides comprehensive services beyond just benefits counseling including employment, housing, and crisis support.

discovered.title: DAV Service Officer - Nashville VA Medical Center
discovered.description: Disabled American Veterans (DAV) service officer providing no-cost assistance with VA disability claims, appeals, and benefits applications. Available to all veterans regardless of DAV membership status.
discovered.address: 1310 24th Avenue South, Room G114 (Nashville VA Medical Center)
discovered.how_to_apply: Call to schedule appointment or visit office at VA Medical Center
discovered.discovery_notes: Service Officer: Monica D. Davison. Located inside Nashville VA Medical Center. Part of national DAV network. Provides expert claims assistance.

discovered.title: American Legion Department of Tennessee - Service Officers
discovered.description: Accredited American Legion service officers providing expert, no-cost assistance to veterans and their families for VA disability benefits applications, appeals, and other claims. Representation available to non-members.
discovered.org_name: The American Legion, Department of Tennessee
discovered.eligibility: All veterans (membership not required for service officer assistance)
discovered.how_to_apply: Contact state headquarters to connect with service officer, or visit local post
discovered.discovery_notes: State headquarters office. Department Service Officer based in Dayton, TN (423-775-7849). Local posts in Nashville include Post 82 (3204 Gallatin Pike) and Post 88 (2717 McCampbell Ave, 615-889-9318).

discovered.title: VFW Service Officers - Nashville Area
discovered.description: Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) service officers providing assistance with disability compensation, rehabilitation, education programs, pension, death benefits, employment and training programs. Will represent veterans in VA hearings and appeals.
discovered.how_to_apply: Contact VFW Department of Tennessee or visit service officers at VA facilities
discovered.discovery_notes: Service officers available at most VA facilities including Nashville VA Medical Center. No membership required for service officer assistance. Specific Nashville post locations not confirmed in search.
